channel.title: Very Basic Beginner
channel.description: I am brand new to carloop, CAN sniffing, to etc. I have a carloop basic and would like to stay capturing CAN traffic on my 2015 Silverado. Despite connecting via the particle WiFi and USB cable, I cannot figure out how to get my raspberry pi 3 to recognize it in a way to allow me to capture can traffic. Any help is really appreciated.

item.title: Very Basic Beginner
item.dc:creator: dgill
item.description:
I am brand new to carloop, CAN sniffing, to etc. I have a carloop basic and would like to stay capturing CAN traffic on my 2015 Silverado.
